70-DR-2023-900051.01
CIRCUIT COURT OF
TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
CHRISTOPHER BLAINE MCGREGOR,
Respondent,
v.
CASE NO.: 70-DR-2023-900051.01
BRITTANY MICHELLE GILLILAND,
Petitioner.
MOTION TO APPOINT GUARDIAN AD LITEM
COMES NOW, Petitioner-Mother BRITTANY GILLILAND, by and through the
undersigned counsel of record, Barbara H. Agricola, with the law firm of Agricola Law, LLC, and
hereby files this Motion to Appoint a Guardian ad Litem. In support thereof, Mother states as
follows:
1. Based on information and belief, it has become apparent that the Minor Children are in
need of counsel to represent their best interests;
2. Defendant requests that this Honorable Court appoint a Guardian ad Litem to represent
the Minor Children’s interest, with the Parties being equally responsible for the costs
of the GAL.
WHEREFORE, PREMISES CONSIDERED, Mother respectfully requests that this
Honorable Court GRANT this Motion and appoint a Guardian ad Litem for the Minor Children
with the costs to be split between the Parties.
Respectfully submitted on November 20, 2024.
/s/ Barbara H. Agricola (AGR004)
Attorney for Mother
Brittany Michelle Gilliland v. Christopher Blaine McGregor
Circuit Court of Tallapoosa County, Alabama
Case No.: CL-2024-0597
